hadiths.text: Narrated Asma' daughter of Yazid: The Prophet (ﷺ) as saying: Any woman who wears a gold necklace will have a similar one of fire put on her neck on the Day of Resurrection, and any woman who puts a gold earring in her ear will have a similar one of fire put in her ear on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الذَّهَبِ لِلنِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Gold For Women
